alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 4:39PM PST until November 07 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sustained northwest winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts near 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...From 11 AM PST this morning until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust will reduce visibilities at times. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
